title: Martin Luther
summary: Martin Luther OSA (/ˈluːθər/;[1] German: [ˈmaʁtiːn ˈlʊtɐ] (listen); 10 November 1483[2] – 18 February 1546) was a German professor of theology, priest, author, composer, former Augustinian monk,[3] and is best known as a seminal figure in the Protestant Reformation and as the namesake of Lutheranism.
